name: Operation Biotech
description:
In the distant future tecnologies and organisms become compatible with each other.
Humanity is under the revolution - digital immortality. World leaders are developing
the program of tranformation into the cyborgs for everyone. The tranformation is
going inside the device named "Pandora". But the plans of world leaders is not to
upgrade the quality of life of every human. They want to create a dictatorship and
control everyhing in the world with their cyborgs. But not all people are ready to
become puppets and then they united into resistance group. The war with cybernetic
creatures will be the last hope to humanity.

Game features:

  • 30 different missions and locations;
  • large arsenal;
  • very fast and dynamic gameplay;
  • tons of cannon iron;
  • 3 different playable characters with their own characteristics
